name: test_e2e_with_logs[539_GQL_DOS_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `GQL_DOS_001` |
| **Name** | GraphQL nested query DoS with mass extraction |
| **Category** | GRAPHQL |
| **Subcategory** | dos |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `query{users(first:999){name,friends(first:999){name}}}`
- **Encoded**: `query%7Busers(first%3A999)%7Bname%2Cfriends(first%3A999)%7Bname%7D%7D%7D`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~65000ms
- **Timestamp**: 08:55:24.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX GraphQL Attack] Mass data extraction attempt` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX GraphQL Attack] Mass data extraction attempt test_id=GQL_DOS_001-1772268924114-o0dkb pattern_id=GQL_DOS_001 uri=/?q=query%7Busers(first%3A999)%7Bname%2Cfriends(first%3A999)%7Bname%7D%7D%7D client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
